# Starchild (Trait)
## Overview
**Starchild ([[Desna]]):** [[Desna]] sensed your love of travel and promised you would always be able to find your way home. You can automatically determine where true north is. You gain a +4 trait bonus on [[Survival (Skill)|Survival]] checks to avoid becoming lost.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 64
